name: google compute engine provision
description: Provision servers in Google Compute Engine

image_name.description: name of the image to use (ie. centos-6-v20130813)

machine_type.description: Machine type defining RAM and CPU

zone_name.description: Zone to start the server in

public_key.description: public key content to copy to the server as authorized key

public_key_path.description: path to public key to copy to the server as authorized key

ssh_user.description: username to use for ssh connection. Note that Google images have root ssh disabled by default
